body: Goblins adore theft, and are adept at slinking about undetected. Goblin sneaks are master ambushers and spectacular hiders. The most talented also incorporate their racial love of fire into their tactics.
name: Goblin Rogues

sections.other_gear: studded leather, dogslicer, mwk dogslicer, shortbow with 20 arrows, 18 gp

sections.body: During Combat A sneak tries to ambush opponents so it can make sneak attacks, then uses Acrobatics to flank.
sections.name: Tactics

sections.special_qualities: rogue talents (finesse rogue), trapfinding +1, weapon familiarity
sections.name: Goblin Sneak
sections.skills: Acrobatics +8, Climb +4, Disable Device +8, Escape Artist +8, Perception +6, Sleight of Hand +8, Stealth +12, Swim +4
sections.combat_gear: potion of cure light wounds, potion of jump, potion of feather fall, alchemist's fire (4), smokesticks (2), thunderstones (4)

sections.ac: 20, touch 17, flat-footed 14 (+3 armor, +5 Dex, +1 dodge, +1 size)
sections.other_gear: mwk studded leather, mwk dogslicers (2), shortbow with 20 arrows, tindertwigs (4), 64 gp
sections.feats: Dodge, Improved Initiative, Two-Weapon Fighting, Weapon Finesse

sections.body: During Combat A firestarter avoids melee, instead making sneak attacks with its bow and using alchemist's fire or flaming arrows to start fires, cause panic, and trap opponents. It saves its goblin skull bomb for a weak opponent, hoping to kill that foe and craft a new goblin skull bomb from the corpse.
sections.name: Tactics

sections.special_qualities: rogue talents (finesse rogue, surprise attack), trapfinding +2, weapon familiarity
sections.name: Goblin Firestarter
sections.skills: Acrobatics +13, Climb +8, Disable Device +13, Escape Artist +13, Perception +9, Sleight of Hand +13, Stealth +17, Swim +8
